name: A New Day (GrapefruitChili, Dannan, Marcus Walker, Tzapora, JasonK_Music)
name_original: A New Day (GrapefruitChili, Dannan, Marcus Walker, Tzapora, JasonK_Music)
description:
Description

Note: This is the updated version, of the post Brackeys 2023.1 Jam submission. The original can be found here - https://ldrg.itch.io/a-new-day-jam

You find yourself in a forest with strange puzzles to solve. Every time you end your day and start a new one, you feel like you're missing something and you are stuck in a cycle.

Break the cycle of days by done things on each day that will allow you to escape the cycle, not everything you encounter will carry over to the next day. You may have to bring things back to your cabin to take let them stay with you through multiple days to solve puzzles across multiple days.

Controls

  • Space to Jump
  • Shift to Sprint
  • E to interact
  • Left Click to release

Credit

  • BryanO - Programming (@BryanOArt)
  • Dannan Vazquez - Programming
  • PetuhBreadv - Art 3D
  • Tzapora - Art 2D
  • snap-flipper - Audio SFX
  • Jason Kelliher - Audio Composer
  • GrapefruitChili - Producer and Designer (@GentleElfGames)
